description: BuildStrategy contains the details of how to perform a build.

customStrategy.description: customStrategy holds the parameters to the Custom build strategy

dockerStrategy.description: dockerStrategy holds the parameters to the container image build strategy.

jenkinsPipelineStrategy.description: JenkinsPipelineStrategy holds the parameters to the Jenkins Pipeline build strategy. Deprecated: use OpenShift Pipelines

sourceStrategy.description: sourceStrategy holds the parameters to the Source build strategy.

type.description: type is the kind of build strategy.
